message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL

The paper proposes a novel approach that uses machine learning and natural language processing techniques to automatically detect inventions that are similar to a given patent application. This involves feature extraction and document comparison, which are common techniques in information retrieval (IR) and natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.IR and cs.CL are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also mentions the use of machine learning, which falls under the categories of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and deep learning (cs.DL). Finally, the paper evaluates the quality of the search process, which suggests the use of evaluation metrics commonly used in machine learning and data mining, such as precision and recall. Therefore, cs.LG is also a likely sub-category.
